name: Kids Sand Surfer - 3D Kids Sand Surfer For Kids

description:
Download Now

Try 'Kids Sand Surfer' which give you amazing jetski riding experience on your iPhone or iPad or iPod Touch.

Ride your supercharged Jet Ski over massive waves, stunt jump your way through this wild ride over splashing waters.

Features: 
***30 visually amazing and challenging Tracks.
 ***Simple,Smooth and effective Controls .
***Astonishing physics brings chaos to another level.
 ***Intelligent enemies driving racing Jetski.
 ***Highly detailed 3D Graphics.
 ***Optimized For iPhone 6.
